page.title: 15MY WEEKEND (CONT.)
page.content: On Sundays some of us go to Sunday School; in Sunday School we listen to stories from the Bible and sing songs.For our Sunday dinner we have chicken, potatoes, carrots, peas, cauliflower and gravy.After lunch we do our homework it takes me about half an hour to do it all.After we have done our homework we go to the park.There is a big slide for older children and a small slide for younger children,there is a rocking boat,big swings and little swings,three climbing frames and some logs.When we get home our tea is usually ready. After tea we watch Murder She Wrote; this is about a woman called Mrs. Fletcher who solves crimes and then writes a novel about what has happened to her.
